data.lyric:
[ti:Please Come Home For Christmas]
[ar:The Eagles]
[al:181681]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Please Come Home For Christmas - Eagles
[00:07.51]Bells will be ringing the glad  glad news
[00:13.16]
[00:15.30]Oh  what a christmas to end the blues
[00:21.67]
[00:23.05]My baby's gone  i have no friends
[00:29.41]
[00:30.90]To wish me greetings  ooh  once again
[00:38.20]
[00:38.77]Choirs will be singing silent night
[00:46.05]
[00:46.77]Christmas carols by candlelight
[00:53.84]
[00:54.66]Please come home for christmas
[00:57.11]
[00:58.18]Please come home for christmas
[01:00.82]
[01:01.90]If not for christmas  by new year's night
[01:08.37]
[01:10.52]Friends and relations send salutations
[01:17.98]
[01:18.50]Sure as the stars shine above
[01:24.72]
[01:26.36]This is christmas  yeah  christmas my dear
[01:32.89]
[01:34.17]The time of year to be with the one you love
[01:40.41]
[01:41.70]So won't you tell me you'll never more roam
[01:49.78]Christmas and new years will find you home
[01:57.24]
[01:57.81]There'll be no more sorrow no grief and pain
[02:04.85]
[02:05.52]And i'll be happy  this christmas once again
[02:12.15]
[02:28.88]There'll be no more sorrow no grief and pain
[02:35.36]
[02:36.76]And i'll be happy  this christmas once again
data.trans:
[ti:Please Come Home For Christmas]
[ar:The Eagles]
[al:181681]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:07.51]鸣钟将会敲响 这是个令人高兴的消息
[00:13.16]
[00:15.30]圣诞节将会结束所有的霉运
[00:21.67]
[00:23.06]我的宝贝走了 我没有朋友
[00:29.42]
[00:30.91]再一次来问候我 
[00:38.20]
[00:38.77]唱诗班将会在寂静的夜晚歌唱
[00:46.05]
[00:46.77]他们将借助烛光唱圣诞颂歌
[00:53.85]
[00:54.67]请回家过圣诞吧
[00:57.11]
[00:58.19]请回家过圣诞吧
[01:00.83]
[01:01.90]如果不是过圣诞 那就过元旦吧
[01:08.38]
[01:10.52]朋友和亲戚之间相互问候 
[01:17.99]
[01:18.50]就像天空闪烁的星星
[01:24.72]
[01:26.37]今天是圣诞节 亲爱的 圣诞节
[01:32.89]
[01:34.18]一年的这个时间都应该和你爱的人在一起
[01:40.42]
[01:41.70]所以你不会告诉我你要再流浪吧
[01:49.78]圣诞节和元旦将带你回家
[01:57.24]
[01:57.82]你就不会再有悲伤 痛苦 伤痛
[02:04.85]
[02:05.52]我将会开心 期待下一次圣诞节
[02:12.16]
[02:28.88]你就不会再有悲伤 痛苦 伤痛
[02:35.37]
[02:36.76]我将会开心 期待下一次圣诞节
